definitions.definition: A hole or break caused by tearing.
examples: A small tear is easy to mend, if it is on the seam.

main_definition: A hole or break caused by tearing.

definitions.definition: A drop of clear, salty liquid produced from the eyes by crying or irritation .
examples: Big tears streamed from Lisa's eyes, rolling down her cheeks.
Ryan wiped the tear from the paper he was crying on.

definitions.definition: Something in the form of a transparent drop of fluid matter; also, a solid, transparent, tear-shaped drop, as of some balsams or resins.
A partially vitrified bit of clay in glass.
That which causes or accompanies tears; a lament; a dirge.

main_definition: A drop of clear, salty liquid produced from the eyes by crying or irritation .
secondary_definitions: Something in the form of a transparent drop of fluid matter; also, a solid, transparent, tear-shaped drop, as of some balsams or resins.
( glass manufacture ) A partially vitrified bit of clay in glass.
That which causes or accompanies tears; a lament; a dirge.
